data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pinheiro, Ulisses, Nicacio, Gilberto, Muricy, Guilherme (2015): An example of the importance of labels and fieldbooks in scientific collections: A freshwater sponge misunderstood for a marine new genus and species. Zootaxa 3974 (3): 447-450, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3974.3.12
